level.heading: File of hearing decisions.
level.text: The Mayor will maintain a file of all hearing decisions, with identifying information deleted, that will be accessible to claimants, their representatives, and other persons upon request to the Mayor.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-201.01.
